content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a function `ispersonal` that returns a trait if the provided Vehicle type is a personal vehicle for everyday driving. All vehicles are subtypes of AbstractVehicle. Function must work for types: Car, Motorcycle, Bus, Truck. The first two should return true, the latter two should return false . The function should default to false for any other subtype of AbstractVehicle. Provide an example.

Here is a possible implementation in Julia:

```julia
abstract Vehicle end
abstract AbstractVehicle <: Vehicle end

mutable struct Car <: AbstractVehicle end
mutable struct Motorcycle <: AbstractVehicle end
mutable struct Bus <: Vehicle end
mutable struct Truck <: Vehicle end

function ispersonal(v::AbstractVehicle)
    if typeof(v) == Car || typeof(v) == Motorcycle
        return true
    elseif typeof(v) == Bus || typeof(v) == Truck
        return false
    else
        return false
    end
end
```
This function checks whether the provided vehicle is a car or a motorcycle. If it is, the function returns `true`. If it is not (i.e., if it's a bus or a truck), the function returns `false`. For any other subtype of AbstractVehicle, the function defaults to returning `false`.

Here are some examples:
```julia
ispersonal(Car()) # true
ispersonal(Motorcycle()) # true
ispersonal(Bus()) # false
ispersonal(Truck()) # false
ispersonal(AbstractVehicle()) # false
```
